title: List of all Androidcircle image   libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Androidcircle image   libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: RoundImage
repoList.description: This library is used for converting Bitmap or Drawable images to Round or Circular Shape. Round image view for Android or Circular Image View for Android.Tags Android Round Circularimageview Circle Rounded Corner imageview library.

repoList.description: RoundingImageView that supports any transitions

repoList.description: This library will allow developer to crop their relative layout in circle with style like gmail profile image.
